bug.short_desc: advertised indicator + data directories don't get created during build
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
The 'indicatordir' and 'iconsdir' advertised in the pkgconfig files for indicator3-0.4 and indicator-0.4 are not included with the main packages. That means indicators installing to the advertised locations own the indicators and icons directories - I think having the library packages own those directories would be preferable.
from indicator-0.4.pc: indicatordir=${libdir}/indicators/7/ iconsdir=${prefix}/share/libindicator/icons/
from indicator3-0.4.pc: indicatordir=${libdir}/indicators3/7/ iconsdir=${prefix}/share/libindicator/icons/
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): libindicator-12.10.1-7.fc24
